title: Returned Studios Tickets
description:
Contact the returned studios team directly!

- `Support Ticket` in order to request support with either a product of ours or a situation in the discord server.

- `Commission Request` to commission us in a field that we specialize in (Pixel Art, Java Development, 3D modeling).

Note that commissions are not always open, please refer to the information channel in the support category to know more about our support/commission states.

Click on a button to open a ticket.
